thread.title: The 10 Funniest Twitter Reactions to George and Amal Clooney Expecting Twins
thread.title_full: The 10 Funniest Twitter Reactions to George and Amal Clooney Expecting Twins

author: ELLE South Africa
title: The 10 Funniest Twitter Reactions to George and Amal Clooney Expecting Twins
text:
The 10 Funniest Twitter Reactions to George and Amal Clooney Expecting Twins “Amal Clooney’s twins and Beyoncé’s twins will sit on the thrones of Narnia.” BY MEGAN FRIEDMAN On Thursday, The Talk host Julie Chen broke the news that George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins. The actor and the human-rights lawyer will welcome their first children in June. As soon as the news broke, Twitter had a million opinions—and comparisons to Beyoncé and Jay Z’s twins, of course. (Those four kids are going to save the world.) Take a look at some of the funniest Twitter reactions to the happy news: BREAKING NEWS: International law and human rights lawyer, Amal Clooney, is expecting twins with her actor-husband. 
— Quinn Sutherland (@ReelQuinn) February 9, 2017 Is there anything Amal Clooney CAN'T do? 
— Girls Really Rule. (@girlsreallyrule) February 9, 2017 Aww! #GeorgeClooney is having twins too! pic.twitter.com/3PQP2TNs27 
— Matt Hanvey (@GarbageFan98) February 9, 2017 Beyonce, Amal Clooney, Chelsea Peretti, Rosie Huntingto-Whitley. I have to assume they all got drunk after an event and cooked a baby. 
— Man-Hating Agenda (@battymamzelle) February 9, 2017 Amal Clooney ima let you finish but beyonce is already carrying the greatest twins of all time 
— gina brady (@gbrady1159) February 9, 2017 yall: clooney twins! 
— Hunter Harris (@hunteryharris) February 9, 2017 George Clooney and Amal Clooney are expecting twins! @Beyonce please arrange playdates and let your kids run the world. 
— Maggie Parkhill (@MaggieParkhill) February 9, 2017 Great. They can marry Jay-Z and Beyonce's twins and finally unite the Houses of Clooney and Carter by blood. https://t.co/9a0ffnrvJ4 
— (((Jess Morgan))) (@JessMorganTO) February 9, 2017 This article originally appeared on elle.com Tags
